By spending 10 minutes
studying or analysing a problem, the character gains a +10
bonus to his next Intelligence Test.
content:
Logic and analysis do for the character what Tarot and
the bones claim to do for the superstitious masses. By
careful consideration of all the possible consequences, and
examination of all evidence and information, the character
can identify the best path for success. By spending 10 minutes
studying or analysing a problem, the character gains a +10
bonus to his next Intelligence Test.
extraSubCategories: Adeptus Astartes, may not be taken by characters with a Psy Rating
